articles.title: What Josh McDaniels said about facing the Raiders
articles.description:
The Patriots offensive coordinator will take on his former team in Sunday's home opener.

The post What Josh McDaniels said about facing the Raiders appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Josh McDaniels returns to Gillette Stadium as Patriots offensive coordinator on September 10.
McDaniels previously coached the Raiders, adding rivalry tension to the matchup.
Local fans anticipate a competitive game, impacting attendance and community engagement.

articles.title: Elizabeth Banks cast as Karen Read: What readers said about the limited series role
articles.description:
Readers debated Elizabeth Banks’ role as Karen Read, suggesting Anne Hathaway, Amanda Peet, Annie Murphy, and more.

The post Elizabeth Banks cast as Karen Read: What readers said about the limited series role appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Elizabeth Banks will portray Karen Read in an upcoming limited series.
Readers suggested alternative actresses like Anne Hathaway and Amanda Peet for the role.
The casting decision has sparked local discussions about representation in Boston's film industry.

articles.title: Architect of Nantucket’s topless beach law faced shunning by friends and prediction of mayhem. Years later, island measure is no big deal.
articles.description:
NANTUCKET — When Dorothy Stover, a seventh-generation Nantucket resident, began pushing for a bylaw allowing topless beachgoers, an angry email hit her inbox: “If this happens, the devil has taken over the island.” Well, in 2022, Stover succeeded in getting the measure passed, and three years later, no devil has appeared. Few people, in fact, […]

The post Architect of Nantucket’s topless beach law faced shunning by friends and prediction of mayhem. Years later, island measure is no big deal. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Dorothy Stover's topless beach bylaw passed in 2022, allowing topless sunbathing on Nantucket.
Three years later, the anticipated chaos has not materialized, with few complaints reported.
The measure reflects changing attitudes towards beach norms, potentially influencing similar discussions in Boston.

articles.title: 2 New England casinos just ranked the best in the U.S. (that aren’t in Las Vegas)
articles.description:
One stands out for its impressive slot machine offerings.

The post 2 New England casinos just ranked the best in the U.S. (that aren’t in Las Vegas) appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Two New England casinos ranked among the best in the U.S. for non-Vegas options.
One casino noted for its impressive slot machine offerings, attracting local visitors.
Boston residents may benefit from increased tourism and entertainment options in the region.

articles.title: What to know about Seisiún, the two-day Irish music festival coming to Boston
articles.description:
Seisiún is a two-day Irish music festival featuring Dropkick Murphys and Celtic punk legends The Pogues, making their first U.S. appearance in 20+ years.

The post What to know about Seisiún, the two-day Irish music festival coming to Boston appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Seisiún festival will take place in Boston over two days, featuring Irish music.
Dropkick Murphys and The Pogues will perform, marking The Pogues' first U.S. show in over 20 years.
The festival aims to boost local tourism and celebrate Irish culture in the community.

articles.title: CommonWealth Kitchen staff, members speak out over toxic nonprofit: Globe report
articles.description:
The Boston Globe spoke to dozens of food business members and staff, many who alleged that CWK has lost its way.

The post CommonWealth Kitchen staff, members speak out over toxic nonprofit: Globe report appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: CommonWealth Kitchen staff report internal strife and a toxic work environment.
Dozens of food business members expressed concerns about CWK's direction and management.
Allegations may affect local food entrepreneurs relying on CWK for support and resources.

articles.title: 44 proposed Mass. ballot questions, including rent control, move to next step — and 3 don’t make the cut
articles.description:
Now the processing of collecting thousands of signatures begins.

The post 44 proposed Mass. ballot questions, including rent control, move to next step — and 3 don’t make the cut appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: 44 proposed ballot questions in Massachusetts, including rent control, advance to signature collection.
Three proposals were rejected, reducing the total to 44 for potential voter consideration.
Successful rent control measures could significantly affect housing affordability for Boston residents.

articles.title: RFK Jr. tries to defend COVID vaccine stance in raucous Senate hearing
articles.description:
He engaged in a heated, loud exchange with Sen. Elizabeth Warren.

The post RFK Jr. tries to defend COVID vaccine stance in raucous Senate hearing appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: RFK Jr. defended his COVID vaccine stance during a Senate hearing on September 4.
He had a heated exchange with Massachusetts Senator Elizabeth Warren.
The hearing highlights ongoing vaccine debates affecting Boston residents' health policies.
